control_description: CRO UBS BB team from Brazil is responsible for reconciling the local control database with the global credit risk system IRIS. This is a monthly control to ensure consistency and accuracy.

gt_5ws.name: who
gt_5ws.reasoning: CRO UBS BB team from Brazil

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Reconcile local control database with the global credit risk system IRIS

gt_5ws.name: where
gt_5ws.reasoning: Report Recon - Local vs Global comparing IRIS information with CDR

control_description: Reviewers ensure that the balance sheet substantiation is completed in line with ATIS (FAP, MAT, SAT). Breaks are identified, investigated, and resolved during the reconciliation process.

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Perform balance sheet substantiation and resolve breaks

control_description: Operations team validates daily cash reconciliations across internal ledgers and external bank statements. Exceptions are logged and escalated if unresolved after 24 hours.

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Validate cash reconciliations across ledgers and bank statements

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To ensure accurate liquidity management and timely exception handling

control_description: IT Security team monitors privileged user activity logs weekly and investigates unusual access patterns. Findings are reported to the Risk Committee.

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Monitor privileged user activity logs and investigate anomalies

gt_5ws.name: where
gt_5ws.reasoning: Access logs from internal monitoring systems

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To prevent unauthorized access and strengthen IT security

control_description: Compliance team reviews quarterly KYC refreshes to ensure client data is up to date and aligned with regulatory requirements. Exceptions are tracked until closure.

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Review quarterly KYC refreshes and track exceptions

control_description: Risk Management team conducts scenario testing of market exposures to identify potential breaches against risk appetite. Results are reported to senior management.

gt_5ws.name: what
gt_5ws.reasoning: Conduct scenario testing of market exposures

gt_5ws.name: where
gt_5ws.reasoning: Market risk models and internal risk systems

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To ensure risk exposures remain within approved appetite

control_description: HR performs semi-annual access reviews to ensure that only authorized employees retain system access.

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To ensure system access is limited to authorized users only

control_description: Finance validates revenue recognition entries against IFRS 15 standards on a quarterly basis.
Internal Audit performs annual reviews of procurement processes to ensure compliance with vendor management policies.

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To ensure compliance with vendor management policies

control_description: Treasury monitors daily FX positions to ensure compliance with regulatory limits and internal policies.

gt_5ws.name: why
gt_5ws.reasoning: To ensure compliance with regulatory limits and internal policies
